description: The alarm reason, only used for trap.

description: The detect MAC, only used for trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MFLP-MIB::hwMflpBdDetectMAC

description: The main interface has been blocked due to MAC-Flapping association.

event.Summary: Main interface ($v3) blocked due to MAC flapping association

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-MFLP-MIB::hwMflpLinkBlocked HUAWEI-MFLP-MIB::hwMflpVsiName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-MFLP-MIB::hwMflpVsiCfgAcName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-MFLP-MIB::hwMflpLinkBlkedIfName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-MFLP-MIB::hwMflpVsiCfgBlockTime u 9999

description: The VSI name referring to the VSI which is correlative to the hwMflpVsiCfg table.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MFLP-MIB::hwMflpVsiName

description: The AC interface name, only used for trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MFLP-MIB::hwMflpVsiCfgAcName

description: MAC-Flapping association, only used for trap.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MFLP-MIB::hwMflpLinkBlkedIfName

description: The blocked time of the interface .
When the value of hwMflpAction is 1, value of hwMflpBlockTime should be
between 10 and 65535.
variables.name: HUAWEI-MFLP-MIB::hwMflpVsiCfgBlockTime

description: The main interface has been unblocked due to MAC-Flapping association.

event.Summary: Main interface ($v3) unblocked due to MAC flapping association
